vote.text: Amendment SA 3722 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3722 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lankford to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5900; text: CR S5900) To improve the bill.
